Posts.Content: hoovergirl82 wrote: I have Stage IV breast cancer that is in my liver and some of my bones.  However, when I first had breast cancer in 2004 and again in 2008, it was Stage 0.  Supposedly noninvasive, I was told this was very rare to have a noninvasive cancer move to other organs. Have any of you had this happen to you?   Dx 4/18/2011, IBC, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Heard of This? hoovergirl82 3monstmama
